# fileAttributes

**Instance Property**

A dictionary of file attributes.

## Declaration

```swift
var fileAttributes: [String : Any] { get set }
```

## Discussion

The file attributes’ dictionary is the same format as that returned by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileManager/attributesOfItem(atPath:)] (`NSFileManager`).

## Accessing Files

- **filename**: The filename of the file wrapper object
- **preferredFilename**: The preferred filename for the file wrapper object.
- **regularFileContents**: The contents of the file-system node associated with a regular-file file wrapper.
